com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Interface ISharedData<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor>

  • Type Parameters:
    DESC -
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISharedBean, ITupleSet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSharedData, SharedBean, TupleSet

    public interface ISharedData<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor>
extends java.io.Serializable
    Defines the set of meta-data associated with data shared into the ISharedDataPlatform. This includes:
    • the name assigned to the data in the platform. Each shared data has a name which must be unique with the platform instance.
    • the owning platform instance identified via an IApplicationDescriptor,
    • a descriptor that may provide more detailed information about the data.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IApplicationDescriptor getApplication()
      Get the application with which this data is associated.
      DESC getDescriptor()
      Provides more detailed information about the data item.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name associated with the application data.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplication

        IApplicationDescriptor getApplication()
        Get the application with which this data is associated.
        Returns:
        never null

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name associated with the application data. This could be the name of a variable or the name of a table. return never null.

      • getDescriptor

        DESC getDescriptor()
        Provides more detailed information about the data item.
        Returns:
        never null
